scripts.build: mkdir -p addon/compiled && google-closure-compiler addon/scripts/sjcl.js addon/scripts/config.js addon/scripts/crypto.js addon/scripts/tokens.js addon/scripts/browserUtils.js addon/scripts/background.js addon/scripts/listeners.js addon/scripts/keccak.js > addon/compiled/bg_compiled.js
scripts.test: mkdir -p addon/compiled && google-closure-compiler addon/scripts/sjcl.js addon/scripts/config.js addon/scripts/crypto.js addon/scripts/tokens.js addon/scripts/browserUtils.js addon/scripts/background.js addon/scripts/keccak.js > addon/compiled/test_compiled.js && jest
scripts.test:watch: mkdir -p addon/compiled && google-closure-compiler addon/scripts/sjcl.js addon/scripts/config.js addon/scripts/crypto.js addon/scripts/tokens.js addon/scripts/browserUtils.js addon/scripts/background.js addon/scripts/keccak.js > addon/compiled/test_compiled.js && jest --watch
scripts.dist: mkdir -p ./dist && cp -a addon/* ./dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/scripts && bestzip ext.zip ./dist && rm -rf ./dist
